SELECT
FROM t_dangze_arrange d_a LEFT JOIN t_dangze d ON d.id = d_a.dangzeId LEFT JOIN t_dangze_content d_c ON d_a.id = d_c.arrangeId WHERE d_a.month = #{month}

SELECT
FROM t_dangze3_arrange d3_a LEFT JOIN t_dangze d ON d.id = d3_a.dangzeId LEFT JOIN t_dangze_content d_c ON d3_a.id = d_c.arrangeId WHERE d3_a.year = #{year} and d3_a.userId = #{userId}
